item.title: Jean-Charles Boisset Brings His Inimitable Style to Yountville
item.description:
Jean-Charles Boisset Brings His Inimitable Style to Yountville

Yountville, known as the Napa Valley's culinary capital, already boasted some of the best restaurant in the region. Now, it also has the hautest new spot, make that spots, with flamboyant Frenchman Jean-Charles Boisset's new JCB Tasting Salon, a wine tasting and luxury lifestyle retail destination, and Atelier by JCB, a gourmet épicerie that offers a curated assortment of gourmet culinary delights.

item.description:
Prosecco Gets Serious About Quality

"These are the most beautiful vineyards I've ever seen. And, I've seen a lot of vineyards," I kept repeating as I visited the captivating hills of Valdobbiadene and Conegliano. I wasn't surprised to learn this nook of the Veneto is petitioning to be recognized as a UNESCO World Heritage site.

item.title: Sonoma Valley Vintners & Growers " VINOLIVO Weekend
item.description:
Sonoma Valley Vintners & Growers " VINOLIVO Weekend

This weekend long affair kicks off in style with not-to-be-missed Grand Tasting event on Friday evening. The festivities continue on Saturday and Sunday when some 40 wineries welcome ticket holders with exclusive VINOLIVO offers and experiences. Intimate winemaker dinners round out the evening schedule offering a deeper exploration into the delights of food and wine pairing.

item.title: Arby's Unveils Leap Day Vegetarian Menu
item.description:
Arby's Unveils Leap Day Vegetarian Menu

ATLANTA, Feb. 25, 2016 /PRNewswire/ -- Arby's, the national sandwich brand devoted to Meatcraft™, has unveiled plans to extend an olive branch to vegetarians on Leap Day. On Feb. 29 only, Arby's will take a leap by offering the company's first ever vegetarian menu, highlighted by Arby's® signature sandwich lineup, minus the delicious meats that make them sandwiches.
